de.payleven.payment

Interface PaymentListener


  • public interface PaymentListener
    Reacts on the payment completion or the error during the payment process.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(PaylevenError error)
      Called in case of the error during the payment process
      void onPaymentComplete(PaymentResult paymentResult)
      Called when payment is completed
      void onSignatureRequested(SignatureResponseHandler signatureHandler)
      When called the customer's signature must be provided in order to confirm the payment.

    • Method Detail

      • onPaymentComplete

        void onPaymentComplete(PaymentResult paymentResult)
        Called when payment is completed
        Parameters:
        paymentResult - contains payment data

      • onSignatureRequested

        void onSignatureRequested(SignatureResponseHandler signatureHandler)
        When called the customer's signature must be provided in order to confirm the payment. Implementation must use signatureHandler in order to confirm or decline the customer's signature
        Parameters:
        signatureHandler - allows to confirm or decline customer's signature

      • onError

        void onError(PaylevenError error)
        Called in case of the error during the payment process
        Parameters:
        error - may be one of the following
        NetworkError in case of no network or internet connection
        BluetoothError in case there is no bluetooth connection with the device
        AuthorizationError in case server failed to authorize current request.In this case it is required to reattempt the operation
        PaylevenError any other case. This is also a super class for other possible errors.
